title: No IP or XP for a game
body: I recently played a beginner not game and won. The game was over 20 minutes so I don't really understand why I didn't get my win of the day bonus.

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, and it looks like you got a good amount of IP for the win.  About 3 times your normal amount.  :D  Everything looks okay here!
